H0.text: Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde are four ghosts in which arcade game. Dig Dug

H1.text: Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde are four ghosts in which arcade game. Donkey Kong

H2.text: Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde are four ghosts in which arcade game. Q*bert

H3.text: Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde are four ghosts in which arcade game. パックマン

A4.text: Blinky gives direct chase to Pac-Man; Pinky and Inky try to position themselves in front of Pac-Man, usually by cornering him; and Clyde switches between chasing and fleeing from Pac-Man depending on his distance from him.

A5.text: The objective of the game is to eat all of the dots placed in the maze while avoiding four colored ghosts—Blinky (red), Pinky (pink), Inky (cyan), and Clyde (orange)—who pursue Pac-Man.
